new meta Burst AD...Top lane jungle . Assassins ?? now ??  rivens already ahead of her pay grade... "Moooom rito's being mean again"....  If your'er a zigs or TF before you can pop a gold... anything remotely squishy, you'll be deleted as soon as you see them come on screen....

is there a movement speed based rune 4 udyr and singe,what about hybrid runes 4 blitz maokai shaco.also why when you look at your chmpion overview  discription why dosent it say if that champ is ad ap health tank or hybrid like in the original platform,so many things have have been left unfinished that annoy me a loyal customer since oce birth
